The documents reveal his involvement with the CIA as early as 1965, including arrangements for cover employment. He was associated with RECE and Tri-State Engineering Service, Inc. for cover purposes. Documents also indicate his involvement in terrorist plotting by Cuban exiles and implication in a CIA plot to kill Castro. He attempted to offer his services to BKHERALD.
